title: Linear Regression Interactive Visualizer
description: Interactive visualization of linear regression showing how the best-fit line minimizes squared errors with draggable data points, parameter sliders, and a loss surface heatmap
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Linear Algebra
Linear Regression
Least Squares
Optimization
learningObjectives: Understand linear regression as finding the best-fit line by minimizing squared errors
Visualize the loss surface as a function of slope and intercept
Connect the normal equations to the OLS solution
Interpret residuals and R-squared goodness of fit
Explore how data changes affect the optimal regression line
